about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: When should you yield your legal right-of-way?

about.name: When should you yield your legal right-of-way?

hasPart.assesses: When should you yield your legal right-of-way? | When should you yield your legal right-of-way? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Never assume other drivers will give you the right-of-way. Yield your right-of-way whenever it helps prevent collisions.

answerExplanation.text: Never assume other drivers will give you the right-of-way. Yield your right-of-way whenever it helps prevent collisions.

comment.text: When should you yield your legal right-of-way? | Never assume other drivers will give you the right-of-way. Yield your right-of-way whenever it helps prevent collisions.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: When should you yield your legal right-of-way? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: When should you yield your legal right-of-way?

hasPart.name: A safety zone is a specially marked area for passengers to get on or off of buses or trolleys. You may not drive through a safety zone:

about.name: A safety zone is a specially marked area for passengers to get on or off of buses or trolleys. You may not drive through a safety zone:

You may not drive through a safety zone: | A safety zone is a specially marked area for passengers to get on or off of buses or trolleys. You may not drive through a safety zone: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You may never drive through a safety zone. This space is set aside for pedestrians.

suggestedAnswer.text: When a bus or trolley is present.

comment.text: When a bus or trolley is present.

suggestedAnswer.text: When a bus or trolley is unloading passengers.

comment.text: When a bus or trolley is unloading passengers.

suggestedAnswer.text: At any time for any reason.

comment.text: At any time for any reason.

acceptedAnswer.text: At any time for any reason.

comment.text: At any time for any reason.

answerExplanation.text: You may never drive through a safety zone. This space is set aside for pedestrians.

hasPart.name: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a:

about.name: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a:

hasPart.assesses: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a: | Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Allow for extra space when driving behind a motorcycle. Motorcycles can stop more quickly than other vehicles can and you must have adequate room to stop if the motorcyclist brakes or falls off. Also, remember that motorcycles are difficult to see at night because they only have one tail light.

answerExplanation.text: Allow for extra space when driving behind a motorcycle. Motorcycles can stop more quickly than other vehicles can and you must have adequate room to stop if the motorcyclist brakes or falls off. Also, remember that motorcycles are difficult to see at night because they only have one tail light.

comment.text: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a: | Allow for extra space when driving behind a motorcycle. Motorcycles can stop more quickly than other vehicles can and you must have adequate room to stop if the motorcyclist brakes or falls off. Also, remember that motorcycles are difficult to see at night because they only have one tail light.

hasPart.name: Various traffic control devices in construction and maintenance work areas are the color:

about.name: Various traffic control devices in construction and maintenance work areas are the color:

hasPart.assesses: Various traffic control devices in construction and maintenance work areas are the color: | Various traffic control devices in construction and maintenance work areas are the color: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Orange warning signs are used in and around work zones. Use special caution when you see orange signs, cones, or barriers on a roadway.

answerExplanation.text: Orange warning signs are used in and around work zones. Use special caution when you see orange signs, cones, or barriers on a roadway.

comment.text: Various traffic control devices in construction and maintenance work areas are the color: | Orange warning signs are used in and around work zones. Use special caution when you see orange signs, cones, or barriers on a roadway.

hasPart.name: The speed limit on a school zone where children are present is ____, unless otherwise posted.

about.name: The speed limit on a school zone where children are present is ____, unless otherwise posted.

hasPart.assesses: The speed limit on a school zone where children are present is ____, unless otherwise posted. | The speed limit on a school zone where children are present is ____, unless otherwise posted. -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When driving within 500 to 1,000 feet of a school while children are outside or crossing the street, the speed limit is 25 mph, unless otherwise posted. Some school zones may have speed limits as low as 15 mph.

answerExplanation.text: When driving within 500 to 1,000 feet of a school while children are outside or crossing the street, the speed limit is 25 mph, unless otherwise posted. Some school zones may have speed limits as low as 15 mph.

comment.text: The speed limit on a school zone where children are present is ____, unless otherwise posted. | When driving within 500 to 1,000 feet of a school while children are outside or crossing the street, the speed limit is 25 mph, unless otherwise posted. Some school zones may have speed limits as low as 15 mph.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: The speed limit on a school zone where children are present is ____, unless otherwise posted. -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: The speed limit on a school zone where children are present is ____, unless otherwise posted.

hasPart.name: At a crosswalk:
hasPart.assesses: At a crosswalk: | At a crosswalk: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Pedestrians have the right-of-way at street crossings but must obey traffic control signals. Where a traffic signal is not present, vehicles must stop for pedestrians in a crosswalk, whether it is marked or unmarked.

suggestedAnswer.text: Construction workers must yield to you.

comment.text: Construction workers must yield to you.

answerExplanation.text: Pedestrians have the right-of-way at street crossings but must obey traffic control signals. Where a traffic signal is not present, vehicles must stop for pedestrians in a crosswalk, whether it is marked or unmarked.

comment.text: At a crosswalk: | Pedestrians have the right-of-way at street crossings but must obey traffic control signals. Where a traffic signal is not present, vehicles must stop for pedestrians in a crosswalk, whether it is marked or unmarked.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: At a crosswalk: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
